messages.mesg: Thank you for showing me how it feels to be truly loved. Youâ€™re the best thing to ever happen to me.

messages.name: bently
messages.mesg: I still think about you. Hope you are doing better.

messages.name: tano
messages.mesg: For another lifetime we would have worked out but for now i wish you the best.

messages.name: nina
messages.mesg: I am finally forgiving for what you did. Im happy now i hope you too
